title: Played 11 Ranked Games
body: 6 of the 11 have been 4v5s. This game is great.

replies.body:
That's how this game get played out:

* 4v5, lose the game
* 4v5 & the enemy is trolling, win the game
* 5v4, win the game
* 5v4 & your team is trolling, lose the game
* 5v5, most rare scenaro I have ever seen in ranked...

> [{quoted}](name=CoolKnightST,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2014-12-30T10:21:20.397+0000)
>
> That's how this game get played out:
> 
> * 4v5, lose the game
> * 4v5 & the enemy is trolling, win the game
> * 5v4, win the game
> * 5v4 & your team is trolling, lose the game
> * 5v5, most rare scenaro I have ever seen in ranked...

got to agree that is how this game is most the time in any mode map.

Over in Dominion it isn't at all uncommon that someone sits out to make a 4v5 a 4v4.

Too bad Ranked Rift is populated with assholes.

> [{quoted}](name=Rebonack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-29T20:51:42.065+0000)
>
> Over in Dominion it isn't at all uncommon that someone sits out to make a 4v5 a 4v4.
> 
> Too bad Ranked Rift is populated with assholes.

Because taking a free win makes you an asshole in the ranked environment.

> [{quoted}](name=SeargentAnus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2014-12-29T21:26:58.166+0000)
>
> Because taking a free win makes you an asshole in the ranked environment.

Sure is too bad Ranked doesn't have a Pause or a No Contest feature, huh?

> [{quoted}](name=Rebonack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2014-12-30T00:41:23.138+0000)
>
> Sure is too bad Ranked doesn't have a Pause or a No Contest feature, huh?

While I do think that the LP loss should be lowered, and the LP gain lowered as well in 4v5. I don't think that it should be completely removed. 4v5 are still 100% winnable.

> [{quoted}](name=SeargentAnus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T00:53:14.078+0000)
>
> While I do think that the LP loss should be lowered, and the LP gain lowered as well in 4v5. I don't think that it should be completely removed. 4v5 are still 100% winnable.

4v5's are not 100% winnable.  That type of comment is asinine.  I think preseason is part of the issue.  Many people are coming back with little knowledge of the game after a long hiatus.  I had a game with a crit dmg % pantheon who fed an azir, and a all CDR Thresh.  The two did nothing but feed.

> [{quoted}](name=Wallaroo0226,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T01:03:53.032+0000)
>
> 4v5's are not 100% winnable.  That type of comment is asinine.  I think preseason is part of the issue.  Many people are coming back with little knowledge of the game after a long hiatus.  I had a game with a crit dmg % pantheon who fed an azir, and a all CDR Thresh.  The two did nothing but feed.

Your chances are lowered, but you still have high chances if you know what you're doing. If the 3 players you're with are average players, and are willing to listen most 4v5s are possible to win. All you have to do is control the enemy team via vision. Know where they ward, know how to control the map, and you can control a whole enemy team.

i am sorry kind sir, i went into a game with a 0/14 karthus and a 0/10 heimer, now, i am just a 3/2/1 tris, even if we hit late game, their fed champions are, {{champion:122}}  and a {{champion:90}}  good fucking luck carrying that shit

> [{quoted}](name=gabinator1000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=0001000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T03:10:55.566+0000)
>
> i am sorry kind sir, i went into a game with a 0/14 karthus and a 0/10 heimer, now, i am just a 3/2/1 tris, even if we hit late game, their fed champions are, {{champion:122}}  and a {{champion:90}}  good fucking luck carrying that shit

You'd probably be unable to carry that even if it was a 5v5 XD
but nooo all 4v5s are winnable right? think my point is proven XD

> [{quoted}](name=SeargentAnus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kpEWK0ZQ,comment-id=000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T01:07:23.370+0000)
>
> If the 3 players you're with are average players

If is a strong word when used like this.
Because ranked matches actually matter.  Ranked =/= dominion
Are you insane? Dominion isn't a ranked match that carries consequences for losing. It doesn't matter if someone AFKs and loses the game for you except leave a bad taste in your mouth.
this is why I play 10 ranked games, get my gold skin, and ignore it every season.
I prefer to stay unranked, I don't want to be associated with that crowd, otherwise people might think, "He's x leagues/ranks behind me, LOL nub"
smurf, yes?
Haven't won ranked since the season ended. Also haven't have a 5v5 team fight in ranked. Plat is actually bronze. Literally the exact same.

Nothing wrong with being Silver lol that's average :) The thing with AFKS and DCs is that you are just as likely to have one on your team as you are to be against one. Just play consistant each game and if you do well the average will raise your elo :)

I played 40 games. 2 of them were 4v5s.

RNGesus praises me.

This is NOT what other Mobas are like.

The 4v5s are pretty ridiculous and need to stopped. 

(Especially in Ranked play, where you will lose points, despite this! How can Riot allow that? Other Mobas do not.)
rather have a 4v5 than a 4v6.

I find it crazy the amount of threads I see people complaining about 4v5s. I've played probably close to 60 games this month and havnt seen a single 4v5 or anything. Only a few (1-3) rage quits, but this is like a 40-10 game and at 20 mins someone leaves after failed surrender, nothing game changing. This is high gold/low plat elo also.

It happens a lot more frequently in bronze/silver, people down there just don't give a shit...
I guess, it's my fault for being bad and having to play with them.
A rage quit is a 4v5....
Nah, I'm pretty sure ranked matches don't matter either.
What account did these games happen on?

It'll get better once preseason is over. 

Wont be perfect. Just better. Maybe try a different game mode? Or avoid ranked. 

Avoiding ranked all season is the way to go.
Your just having an exceptionally unlucky streak. Everyone gets e occasionally, but dont think I've ever had that hard a slump
